pageTitle: J Brand Ready-to-Wear Cody Drape Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Bottom layer sold separately. Imported, China. Dry clean. 100% polyester. Fabric: Chiffon. A sweeping asymmetrical hem cuts a striking silhouette on an airy blouse cut from elegant silk chiffon. Short kimono sleeves drape to the elbow, and a hidden placket lends a seamless look. Sheer. Description Tops > Clothing > J Brand Ready-to-Wear > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer J Brand single-handedly redefined the denim world with its launch in 2004, and it's staged to do it again with its expansion into a full ready-to-wear collection. J Brand Ready-to-Wear is designed with the idea that a woman can dress everything back to her skinny jeans, and the label uses a mix of classic elements and refined edge to make dressing effortless. "We wanted the collection to feel subtly sophisticated, a modern-day approach to our J Brand woman's wardrobe," says Creative Director Donald Oliver. See all J Brand Ready-to-Wear reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details
